https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/mFFE1XviOLL96OTVDZvP1gZh6y7.jpg Olivia's life feels empty after her boyfriend, Jamie disappears. She has a hard time trusting anyone, even when she meets Aryo, Jamie's friend. Problems arise when Jamie finds out Aryo is truly in love with her. Broken Hearts
